text: at are the signs and symptoms of Primrose syndrome? Signs and symptoms of primrose syndrome that have been reported in the literature include: Severe learning disabilities Boney ear cartilage Cystic changes in to top of the arm and leg bones Cataracts (clouding of the lens of the eyes) Recurrent ear infections Hearing loss  Pogressive ataxia (uncoordinated movement) often with onset in   Pyramidal signs (which shows there is a problem with the nervous system) Muscle wasting of the lower limbs To
